article_title: What Congress' Annual Doc Fix Charade Says About Washington

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: The same day President Obama recently heralded Obamacare’s imaginary successes in a Rose Garden ceremonial press conference, he quietly signed into law a very real $115 billion deferred tax increase on future generations. That tax increase came in the form of additional borrowing to subsidize Washington’s worst habit: putting off until tomorrow what we should be doing today.
